news_header: Stora Enso will resume timely payments to suppliers.
news_text: Stora Enso has decided to stop delaying payments to suppliers of goods and services. According to Dagens Industri, the company had previously planned its cash flow by scheduling payments from September to October. Stora Enso confirmed this and stated that payments for damages were made. CEO Hans Sohlström apologized for any potential consequences of the company's actions.
